name: Perfect Pimm's Cup
description: The standard Pimm's cup is made by mixing Pimm's with "white lemonade" (a.k.a. Sprite or 7-Up) along with chopped fruit and ice.
recipeIngredient: 3 cups (24 ounces) Sprite, 7-Up, or other clear citrus soda

recipeInstructions.text: Layer fruit slices and ice in a pitcher. Add Pimm's and soda. Stir gently with a wooden spoon to combine. Pour into glasses, making sure to get fruit and ice in each glass. Garnish with mint, and serve.
